attributes.action: Stop schools from showing the Al Gore movie "An Inconvenient Truth"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British schools have a responsibility to ensure that our children are educated in a fair and balanced manner and to ensure anything presented to them as fact, is correct. This movie shows only one side of an argument which, regardless of what groups like the IPCC might like us to think, has not been proven, and is nothing more than environmentalist propoganda.

It would be wrong to show this movie unless one giving an alternative view (such as "The Great Global Warming Swindle") were shown allowing children to then discuss both sides of the argument.
